spec_data.Name: libdv
spec_data.Description:
The Quasar DV codec (libdv) is a software codec for DV video, the
encoding format used by most digital camcorders, typically those that
support the IEEE 1394 (a.k.a. FireWire or i.Link) interface. libdv was
developed according to the official standards for DV video: IEC 61834
and SMPTE 314M.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 07:27:33 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Software decoder for DV format video
